description: Post to this service to send Notifications (max. 2048 bytes)

image.description: Url to the image that is shown in the notification

action.description: Action to be done when the user clicks the notification

data.description: additional JSON data, that can be send with the notification

token.description: SSO Token of the initiating service or user

scopeIds.description: One or more scope Ids that either represent a single user or a group of users

create.description: Post a Message to the Service that will be resolved to one or many notifications

201.description: Message was created and will be delivered to the specified user/group of users

400.description: The Provided payload is either incomplete or one or more values are invalid
